comments:
I will get the following error dialog even my test program launches 
successfully. This happens for both local and remote launch. This does not 
happen using WSAD 5.1.2 with the same Hyades Data Collection Engine.

IWAT0008E Error launching HelloWorld.

Reason:
IWAT0007I Either the Agent Controller (RAServer.exe) is not started, or the
Java path is incorrect. See log for more details.

Ref: 20040419_0915

Can you confirm that your program did actually run?
What was the exception in the log?
*** Bug 59110 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

workbench, with the RAC on AIX. The program I launch runs fine, though (I get
